website_summaries.verdict: A light-coverage foundation and moisturizer in one that also includes SPF for sun protection.
pros: Lightweight moisturizer that's available in a variety of shades to help even your complexion
Contains vitamin C to help lighten dark spots
Gives a natural finish and blends easily
cons: Not ideal for oily skin since it is a moisturizer

customer_reviews.title: Go to makeup!
customer_reviews.text: My go-to makeup. Perfect in the summertime when you just need some light coverage and moisturizer. Great in colder weather with a little bit of powder on top for extra coverage. Lasts a long time too! I buy a new one every 3-4 months. You only need a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tinted moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be everything I wanted out of a tinted moisturizer, and it was. The color stays pretty consistent throughout the day, though obvious absorbtion through the skin happens. Its lightweight, a little bit oily, with just the right amount of color to cover redness. Since I no longer worry about blemishes, all I really care for is consistent color and even skin tone. This product is worth the money and I will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer/makeup I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I am blonde haired, blue eyed and fair skinned with a slight tan. Perfect color. The best moisturizer, make-up I have used to date. It has an SPF of 30 which is recommended by my dermatologist. As an older person, I have very uneven skin and some blotchiness and redness in areas. This gives my older complexion just the look I want and the photos of me taken with this cover looks so great. It is really worth the money. You get what you pay for for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiB

customer_reviews.title: it's nice because it's light weight and so far it hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm dark skinned and this is one of the only tinted moisturizers i have found for my complexion. it's nice because it's light weight and so far it hasn't caused any acne or irritation (i have sensitive skin). But like i said it's light weight so it won't cover you like a foundation or cc cream but i like it because that's what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: NARS is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before estimated delivery date and is the real deal, not a nock off. I've been using NARS for a couple years and sometimes try other brands but keep coming back to NARS tinted moisturizer. It is just what I need as a busy Mom.
customer_reviews.author: SarahBarah

customer_reviews.title: This product goes on like liquid silk
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on like liquid silk. It blended my skin to a porcelain finish. I have very white skin with yellow undertones. I chose the tint in a pink. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Drinkwine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I blend this with my moisturizer and the look is so natural and smooth. Excellent product. Lasts all day. Gives my skin a nice healthy glow without looking bronzed or fake.
customer_reviews.author: nycchic

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tinted moisturizer, I have tried them all and the only other non-oily tinted ( nice coverage) moisturizer would be Laura Mercier, but it’s about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: had laura mercier tinted moisturizer too but this tinted mositurizer is much better! with much more coverage but still moisturizing and lightweight. it could feel bit more heavy than laura mercier tho. but i would repurchase nars over laura mercier.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This is It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted moisturizer. It blends into my skin and does not look like I'm wearing anything (clothing excluded) but my skin. I have tried a lot of products over the last six months and this is what I'm sticking with. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Waters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. It takes me 2 minutes to apply and makes me looked polished. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this product is awesome! I love it so much better than regular foundation, which I have tried many different brands. The coverage is great and goes on smooth. I have freckles and this covers them nicely. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: Typically get it fro. Sephora or Ulta but when they are out of my color or don’t have time to run out Amazon is my go to. Nice and light for quick days where I just want to even my skin tone a bit and go. Also buildable when I want a more made up look. It’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nici Montes

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: It is a great moisturizer and makeup in one with sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: MM in Danville

customer_reviews.title: Great tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I apply with my fingers over my concealer. I only need it to last through my 8 hour day. If you need it to last longer then another application can be applied. It is also buildable.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Valcin

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck
customer_reviews.text: Great for my neck; protective and nicely tinted . Doesn't cause irritation to my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: At my age, its so hard to find a good cover up that does not accentuate my crow lines. It's extremely light weight and you do not have to use much- also makes my skin look youthful.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Morris

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff for the warmer months
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff for the warmer months. It evens out my skin without feeling heavy and once it settles, it feels weightless. It even photographs well.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best Tinted Moisturizer To Date
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 20, so it's difficult to find tinted moisturizers which provide enough coverage for me. However, this was the ONLY product I used on my face all summer! I do find that not to be true for the past few months, though, and that's the only reason I'm not rating this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product for "senior skin"!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. My friends always comment on the "glow" I always seem to have on my face and I tell them it's from Nads Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer SPF30. Buy it and enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Grund

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin look dewy. Naturally dry skin, but I don’t really have any skin problems. Really makes my tired skin look bright and natural.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a tube!
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula! The coverage is perfect - more than a tired moisturizer but not as heavy as a foundation. No smell and smooth application. The medium was the perfect color for my blonde hair and light eyes. I am fair but with yellow undertones.
customer_reviews.author: KSHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, silky, spf
customer_reviews.text: My go to tinted moisturizer. I don’t go a day without wearing it.. silly and smooth and doesn’t feel greasy. Also love that it has spf
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Tisellano

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: This product made my eyes water and sting! Maybe it is the spf? I couldn’t wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Harper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great. I will wear this only when going to the pool or when i know i will be outside a long time. leaves a nice fresh look on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, however the seller was not clear on the shade of the nars item I bought. It is far too light.
customer_reviews.author: Megladon 🦈

customer_reviews.title: Poreless Skin
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better tinted moisturizer blends effortlessly and makes skin look like glass.
customer_reviews.author: kristi morris

customer_reviews.title: really like this product/not my first time purchase
customer_reviews.text: really like this product/not my first time purchase. I would recommend trying it in a local shop to be sure you purchase the right shade for your skin. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: daniel hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage. Doesn't make me look too made up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: ... tried about 15 different brands and finally found the perfect tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about 15 different brands and finally found the perfect tinted moisturizer. The coverage is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Mott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, smells great, and looks great! I am so pleased. I was not sure what color would be a good match...the descriptions were very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: If I were stranded on a desert island and could only take one item...this would be the one!
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this review short and sweet...I'm a huge fan of this tinted moisturizer. I don't like a heavy base feel. This provides a nice light coverage and it blends with my skin tone. Once I put it on I don't feel like I'm wearing makeup...and I love that. If you're looking for something that provides medium to heavy coverage...this is not for you. Otherwise, give it a try...I really think you'll like it. And, although a bit pricey, it's worth the money. One tube lasts me at least 11 months.
customer_reviews.author: JSparks

customer_reviews.title: Really happy to have discovered it
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to everyday foundation. It evens out my aging skin without looking caked in any way, protects from the sun, and is a decent moisturizer. I find that I need to use only a small amount. Really happy to have discovered it, now several years ago.
customer_reviews.author: MCW

customer_reviews.title: I've been casting around for years for the perfect tinted moisturizer with sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I've been casting around for years for the perfect tinted moisturizer with sunscreen, and I think this might be the one. It's pretty expensive and I am generally reluctant to spend huge amounts on makeup, but this does a much better job than the less-expensive moisturizers I've tried. It blends into the skin beautifully, evening out skin tone nicely. A little goes a long way, which means the cost per use is probably not much higher than what I spent on cheaper options. I have a fair complexion and bought Finland, after checking NARS website for tint information.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: Love this - would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great moisterizer. Give me a nice glow.. I would recommend purchasing. I only use a dot on each check and one on forhead and chin and then brush in and it give me perfect coverage. Not like a foundation look more natural
customer_reviews.author: somes

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite foundation! I have tried so many foundations and this is the only one that provides coverage and doesn't look heavy or unnatural. I have very sensitive skin and I never break out from it. I would recommend this to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color for tanned skin gives an even skin tone and glow. Highly recconend.
customer_reviews.author: Aneeza

customer_reviews.title: The best Tinted Moisturizer out there as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Amazon because couldn't find @ store. The best Tinted Moisturizer out there as far as I'm concerned. I'm 76 and have been wearing this brand for about 3 years. First got @ Saks. Goes on beautifully and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Good  tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tinted moisturizer. The color I picked, Alaska, is very well suited to my fair skin. This product does give a dewy finish to my skin. And it has SPF 30 sun protector. The coverage is good too,a little better than some moisturizers with tint.
customer_reviews.author: "Ali"

customer_reviews.title: Must have product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second tube of this product. It evens out skin tone and blends in perfectly . It has the requirements that my dermatologist recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sammye k Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hope his color of tinted moisturizer doesn't get discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It goes on very smooth and looks very natural. And most importantly, it has an SPF of 40. I do also use the Nars bronzer on top just to give my face some dimension however.
customer_reviews.author: mn

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints other than the expensive price haha. Overall this is a great product and NARS doesn't animal test.. it's parent company does however Update: Now NARS isn't cruelty free. I no longer buy from them
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent and color, but bad for my acne.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lemony-scent of this stuff, but was ultimately disappointed. I found that it triggered acne-breakouts for me, and also had a tendency to uh, collect in the creases above my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite foundation because it isn't too thick or opaque
customer_reviews.text: Favorite foundation because it isn't too thick or opaque. It oxidized lighter than it came out of the tube. I'm not in love with the scent (it smells like MAC face and body foundation) but I do like the formula a lot.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ennui

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily
customer_reviews.text: This summer I have change my make up base for this moisturizer, I ussually use NC25-30 and this matches with my skin tone perfectly. It has a yellow undertone, which is perfect for redness. I use it with a neutral powder to reduce the brights because it has a glowy effect. For me it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: YOANA MENA BUENDIA

customer_reviews.title: love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I don't like heavy makeup so I prefer the tinted moisturizers or mineral loose powder. This product offers great coverage and blends well. I do find myself needing to touch up later in the day, but I do have Combo to oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: KMilton1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tinted sunscreen. It goes on smoothly and spreads evenly. I use it instead of make up, that's how high maintenance I am...
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Sooo glad I took a chance on this one
customer_reviews.text: ***WOW*** I have finally found "The One"! Sooo glad I took a chance on this one. After reading reviews online, I was convinced I had to try it & now I don't think I'll ever look back. My search has finally ended:) Thank You, Nars Company, for putting out a superior product!!
customer_reviews.author: HEIDI WINTERS

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased directly from NARS
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the product I disliked, the size of this is like a sample size. I could have purchased the regular size from NARS for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Great all over coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally the easiest to apply. No primer needed and it lasts all day without feeling too dry.
customer_reviews.author: huemame

customer_reviews.title: This is very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice if you want a tinted moisturizer, don't expect it to cover up everything. This works well with layers or just a layer. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: it's easy to apply, feels really good, very smooth, will refer to a friend and definetely will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's loyal customer

customer_reviews.title: Silkly smooth. I stick with this product for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Silkly smooth. I stick with this product for the texture. It feels luxurious and not suffocating to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice coverage and color. Lightweight. Not a fan of the scent which is very perfumie/old-ladyesque.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Best tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Gives a light shimmer, love the shade Alaska. I can wear it most months (July and August I mix it with a darker shade). It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: brook frye

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in a review in Lucky magazine of the best summer skin products. This definitely lives up to its excellent reviews and high rating!
customer_reviews.author: Waterbourne

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: this is so light weight and color is great for a tan look.nars is a really good makeup company.happy with this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: fashion wise

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this tinted moisturizer, its truly on of the best along with my Laura Mercier. It arrive in a timely manner and I was very please. Cant stop wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Creamer

customer_reviews.title: So smooth and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mineral powder for I used all of my bare essentials; however, upon reading all the great reviews for this product, I had to try it. I love it! I wasn't in love with my mineral powder bc it left my skin dry, so when I read that this product is a moisturizer, I was sold! I needed lightweight coverage to wear to work that would give me a nice glow. This product does it all. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: perfect for redness
customer_reviews.text: It is light but still has coverage. I have oily skin, but I don't like cakey makeup. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Exactly what I buy at Sephora- loved it and will purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coloring Options, Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm lazy with makeup, so this is the perfect balance of easy and good. Not a ton of coverage but enough to smooth out some of the uneveness of my skin and give it a better glow. Plus, SPF and moisturizer = I actually take care of my skin. And the in-between color options make this a viable product for me. I have pale-medium cool/cool-natural skin, and it is IMPOSSIBLE to find my color. Not with this, though. Literally the only product I've ever found that's both easy and comes in my color. And it works, to boot. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Summers

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Moisturizer Though Seller Price is High
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fir many years. It is my favorite moisturizer. Light weight with a natural tint that hides skin imperfections. I gave two stars for price because the seller price is several dollars more than the sensible retail price. But I ran out and couldn’t go to the department store.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryBuff

customer_reviews.title: Great for Non-Whites
customer_reviews.text: They may not have the widest shade range, but the colors that they do have available for non-white people are VERY good quality. It took me a good amount of time to even find a bb cream that isn't solely for various shades of white. So, took stars away because I can't recommend it to a lot of my non- white friends, but the few friends this product provides coverage for, they absolutely love it as well as my self.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tinted Moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing full on foundation, but I do need sunscreen, lotion and some light coverage and this is ABSOLUTELY perfect for that. Easily washes off but stays on all day. Can build coverage if needed or spot treat. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: IShopAlotonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way, the coverage is perfect and it’s lightweight not like foundation and as the day goes on it melts into your skin
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Package was open upon receipt.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shade and the light coverage, BUT... it arrived opened! The outside packaging was good, but once I opened it, the actual box was smashed and opened and the tube was practically leaking. I’m going to keep it because it matches my skin so well, I just hope it’s safe to use. It arrived very quickly, and would have gotten more stars if it weren’t for the opened box. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: HELLO KITTY

customer_reviews.title: the best purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This looks so good on my skin and it's very hydrating. I wish I knew about this a long time ago. The more I use it the more my skin is looking better. Must have!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer or for medium  coverage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me! I love it and use it everyday for light to medium coverage. Never will use anything else. Natural looking and it has spf
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine247365

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this foundation. Not thick at all, can't even tell when I have it on, it just smooths out the imperfections! Its so nice and light and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage to wear alone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tinted moisturizer in the summer. It provides a pretty decent amount of coverage so I will usually wear it by itself. Plus the SPF is an added bonus. It smells good too, like Fruit Loops?, which is weird but nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy LaRoche

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my aging skin
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for about 4 months, works really well on my 50ish skin.
customer_reviews.author: GoodLifeKelly

customer_reviews.title: Favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tinted moisturizer- it provides light coverage, without being greasy. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Metty

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely a tinted moisturiser girl and this works wonders. I am a Stromboli on Nars Sheers Glow and got the St. Moritz which is similar match, though St. Moritz doesn't have much yellow to it. This compares close to Laura Mercier, and they both work beautifully. This is good for evening out the skin and creating a healthy look. It isn't too dewy or matte. Always going to repurchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Cub

customer_reviews.title: I tried many different brands and this is my favorite. It might be a bit expensive in comparison ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried many different brands and this is my favorite. It might be a bit expensive in comparison with other tinted moisturizer but it totally worths it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the BB cream - it covers nicely without looking ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the BB cream - it covers nicely without looking like you're caked in makeup. I also love that there's an SPF in it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Its light and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It evens out my summer tone and protects too!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Flawless look!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. I can never find a foundation to match my skin perfectly but this does! And the coverage is amazing but it feels so light! Gives me a nice glow! It looks flawless under a powder!
customer_reviews.author: Asia Lox

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of all Nars products, especially the Radiant ...
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of all Nars products, especially the Radiant Moisturizer. It provides smooth , light natural color all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne F. Pieroni

customer_reviews.title: Great BB cream
customer_reviews.text: This gives great coverage without feeling heavy on your skin, I wear it everyday and my skin loves it, Will be repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: K.A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great coverage. Best tinted moisturizer I've found yet!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: natural look!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. It is the perfect base for older wormen who want more nMore natural lookatural look!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances L. Henely

customer_reviews.title: Great tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizer that doesn't clog pores? check SPF 30? check Tinted color so I don't have to wear foundation? check Great product that satisfies several requirements. This is the 2nd time I bought it and refuse to use anything else. The coverage is light but surprisingly thorough for something that is not a foundation. I wouldn't wear it when I need full coverage of course, but it's perfect for daily wear to work. And unlike Sephora, with Amazon I got free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Book_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic & amazing. Makes my skin feel softer than a baby's behind! Definitely repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover258

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible allergic reaction to this product and had to throw it away. However, I liked the way it looked on before the reaction. It took me awhile to realize that this product was causing the problem. I used powder over it, and it stayed on all day. I liked the idea of a strong sunscreen. Perhaps it will work better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Best tinted moisturizer ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of tinted moisturizers and this one is by far the best. You only have to use a small amount and it covers just like a regular foundation. Feels great and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Great light makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Great tinted moisturizer, I would say it is more like a light foundation. I have combination skin and after matifying moisturizer it goes smooth, adds nice tint and if I need to remove extra shine, I use powder and/or blotting paper. It stays all day on the skin. This shade, terre neuve, will match light-skin. It is not yellowish, more pinkish-pale. And for me it was too light, so I mix it with Alaska shade in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Linguista

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried it
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the hot Az. sun! Gives protection, hydration and just the right tint.
customer_reviews.author: Jannae'

customer_reviews.title: This tinted sunscreen works well and is perfect for my skin complexion
customer_reviews.text: This tinted sunscreen works well and is perfect for my skin complexion. It feels very light on my face. I plan on ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Applies and blends in easily and smoothly. A tube lasts for months, well worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Goes on nicely, nice finish and the SPF 30 is a
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the summertime instead of foundation. Goes on nicely, nice finish and the SPF 30 is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Titus

customer_reviews.title: Natural and Sheer Bronze Glow
customer_reviews.text: Light and sheer, but lasts all day. Gives just a hint of natural bronze color. Does not clog pores or irritate skin. Perfect shade for medium toned individuals who want just a bit of natural bronze glow. Lasts even longer if you mix it with a dab of MAC Prep+Prime and the Nars Illuminator in Laguna.
customer_reviews.author: luluuwa13

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally pressed for time and so don't have too much time to apply make-up. However, this product is my solution for quick application with decent coverage. It's not too heavy and has a fantastic scent.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: just perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is a dream come true. I usually wear Iman foundation in clay2 or revlon in caramel or rich ginger. The seychelles color is a perfect match. My skin looks healthy. I have oily combination skin and experience breakout once in a while so I wasn t sure if this product was the one to choose at first. It turned out a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mawogani

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I heard alot about this product so I wanted to try it. Unfortunately, it didn't work for me. I gave it a 3 though because it went on very smoothly and it wasn't bad but the color was not right for me. I tried Laura Mercier which was much better for the sheer look I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color and coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! The tinted moisturizer I was using from Smashbox can't compare. I purchased Alaska and, while it's a liiiittle darker than my natural color, it looks REALLY natural, especially when blended down my neck. It doesn't appear oily and lasts my whole 9-hour work day. I also have roseacea and this covers the redness completely, except when it's really bad. I started getting chemical peels and even with my skin being dry and flaking, this covers it really nicely. I'm obscenely happy with it and will stay with NARS and this product in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: decent mineral moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall radience (and many products bandy this about but seldom deliver). However, I wish I'd taken a chance on a slightly darker tint. But I do have a few leftover TMs to blend it with (the Balm, CoverFx). In general i recommend. But do bear in mind what one reviewer mentioned about being ok with a yellowish cast. that works for me as i have some blotchy redness around my nose (yay).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carducci

customer_reviews.title: Nars tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love all Nars products and have been using for a long time. This product is a tinted moisturizer for pale skin.
customer_reviews.author: Babette Penton

customer_reviews.title: Great light foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love it. With my combination skin :) It is light, moisturizing and does not look like a mast on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Linguista

product_meta.title: Nars Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer SPF 30/PA+++, Alaska, 1.9 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Alaska - Light with a neutral balance of pink and yellow undertonesA lightweight tinted moisturizer with a broad spectrum SPF 30 that helps to improve skin's overall condition. It helping to reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation and dark spots in just four weeks and re-mineralize the skin for a softer, smoother, and brighter natural glow.
feature_bullets: reduce the appearance of dark spots
